Package com.stormpath.shiro.realm

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AccountPermissionResolver
    An AccountPermissionResolver inspects a Stormpath Account and returns that Account's directly assigned Permissions.
    AccountRoleResolver
    An AccountRoleResolver inspects a Stormpath Account and translates it to one or more Role names that Shiro can use for role-based access control checks.
    ApplicationResolver  
    GroupPermissionResolver
    A GroupPermissionResolver inspects a Stormpath Group and returns that Group's assigned Permissions.
    GroupRoleResolver
    A GroupRoleResolver inspects a Stormpath Group and translates it to one or more Role names that Shiro can use for role-based access control checks.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccountCustomDataPermissionResolver
    A CustomDataPermissionResolver implementation that merely delegates lookup logic to the parent class, first calling account.getCustomData().
    ApplicationRealm
    A Realm implementation that uses the Stormpath Cloud Identity Management service for authentication and authorization operations for a single Application.
    CustomDataPermissionResolver
    A CustomDataPermissionResolver accesses a specific named field value of a CustomData resource that contains a Set&lt;String&gt; of Shiro permission Strings.
    DefaultApplicationResolver  
    DefaultGroupRoleResolver
    Default implementation of the GroupRoleResolver interface that allows a Stormpath Group to be translated into Shiro role names based on custom preferences.
    GroupCustomDataPermissionResolver
    A CustomDataPermissionResolver implementation that merely delegates lookup logic to the parent class, first calling group.getCustomData().
    PassthroughApplicationRealm
    An ApplicationRealm implementation that accepts an already authenticated Account.
    PassthroughApplicationRealm.AccountAuthenticationToken  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DefaultGroupRoleResolver.Mode
